item.title: Variable errors
item.dc:creator: @melt_man1 melt man1
item.description:
@melt_man1 wrote:

Okay, so all the other things around my commands say sendMessege, but this one wont use it… Im using the Nocturnal Pk source. If that helps.

if(Command.startsWith("skull")) { if(skull !=1 && !isSkulled) { skull = 1; isSkulled = true; sM("You have been skulled."); } else { sM("You are all ready skulled!"); } } if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("corey") || playerRights > 0) { if (Command.startsWith("yell") && Command.length() > 5) { if (yellDelay <= 0) { if (muted == 0) { yellDelay = 10; Server.s.playerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+": "+ Command.substring(5); } else sendMessage("You can't use this while you are muted."); } } }

Or if this helps.

item.title: Variable errors
item.dc:creator: @melt_man1 melt man1
item.description:
@melt_man1 wrote:

[code]client.java:30001: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable skull
location: class client
if(skull !=1 && !isSkulled) {
^
client.java:30001: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable isSkulled
location: class client
if(skull !=1 && !isSkulled) {
^
client.java:30002: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable skull
location: class client
skull = 1;
^
client.java:30003: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable isSkulled
location: class client
isSkulled = true;
^
client.java:30004: cannot find symbol
symbol : method sendMessege(java.lang.String)
location: class client
sendMessege(“You have been skulled.”);
^
client.java:30006: cannot find symbol
symbol : method sendMessege(java.lang.String)
location: class client
sendMessege(“You are all ready skulled!”);

                            ^

6 errors
Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

Can anybody help me fix this error i got here? It wont compile my server till i do, and im trying to add this command…
